# Set-MCDConfig

Source: `source/Private/Core/Config/Set-MCDConfig.ps1`

## Synopsis

Writes an MCD configuration object to ProgramData.

## Description

Serializes a hashtable to JSON and writes it to
%ProgramData%\MCD\Profiles\<ProfileName>\<ConfigName>.json. This is used by
the Workspace flow to create/update a profile configuration.

## Parameters

| Name | Type | Mandatory | Pipeline | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| ConfigName | String | Yes | No | Name of the configuration file to write (Workspace or WinPE). |
| Data | Hashtable | Yes | No | Hashtable that will be serialized to JSON and written to disk. |
| ProfileName | String | No | No | Workspace profile name to store the configuration under ProgramData. |

## Examples

### Example 1

```powershell
Set-MCDConfig -ConfigName WinPE -ProfileName Default -Data @{ PreferPSGalleryUpdate = $true }

Writes the WinPE configuration for the Default profile.
```
